# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1000000 to you, and we believe it would greatly enhance your endeavors or personal collection. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $800000, aiming to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $800,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $800,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
